original_title: Sold Boy: The Martin Brawer Story
overview: Sold Boy - The Martin Brawer Story... besides Martin Brawer as the star of this continued story you also see the Man's-Art® stars Ronald Laska, Kriss Stahl and Rivelli again. Martin Brawer fucks outdoors and indoors, gets fucked, and swallows cum where he can get it. Watch out, the movie contains piss and bareback actions. A great film, absolutely worth seeing and should not be missing in your collection of quality films.
title: Sold Boy: The Martin Brawer Story
